bibl.title: The Documents from the Bar Kokhba Period in the Cave of Letters. Greek Papyri. Aramaic and Nabatean Signatures and Subscriptions, edited by Yadin Yigael and Jonas C. Greenfield. (Judean Desert Studies.)
bibl.note: P. Yadin I, 5; 11-35; 37 [Nos 1-4, 6-10 and 36 (Aramaic and Nabatean) will appear in Volume II]. - The Babatha archive (94-132 AD).
bibl.seg: Lewis Naphtali (edited by), The Documents from the Bar Kokhba Period in the Cave of Letters. Greek Papyri. Aramaic and Nabatean Signatures and Subscriptions, edited by Yadin Yigael and Jonas C. Greenfield. (Judean Desert Studies.)
